Tours & Activities

Corcovado National Park Hikes

Explore one of the most biologically intense places on Earth with guided hiking tours through Corcovado National Park.

Local Trail Hikes

Discover the natural beauty around Puerto Jimenez with guided hikes outside Corcovado National Park.

Kayak Tours

Paddle through mangroves and coastal waters while observing local wildlife and marine life.

Canopy Tours

Experience the rainforest from above with exciting zip-line adventures through the canopy.

Gold Tours

Learn about the region's gold panning history and try your luck finding gold in local rivers.
